alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, north central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oakleaf Plantation to near Nas Jax to near Bayard. Movement was north at 30 mph. This storm is producing a strong gust front ahead of it. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Mandarin, Arlington, Baymeadows, Ortega, Oakleaf Plantation, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Nas Jax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
